# Fires & Breaches
Fires and breaches are an inevitability due to the highly flammable gas and endless snow of Earth present in and around the evac point, so it's important to know how to manage them.
## Breaches Breaches are arguably the easier of the two to handle. While it does render an area extremely cold (and potentially low pressure), it can be trivially solved by simply sealing the hole that resulted in the vacuum and introducing a small amount of warm air.
## Fires Fires can be delt with through a multitude of ways, but some of the most effective methods include: - Breaching the enflamed area if possible. This will destroy all of the gasses in the room, which may be a problem if you're already straining life support.
